body: Hi Chris, I have noted a thing about Ladybug_3DChart. For example, if you want to visualize data from January to March, the component works fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHlecM3Wfv82ahz569ak3k0qD8k7UT6bPzi3kgtpgLcX1O85Mx4Y*rYwchwmPXQD*xNZKiBG21NbMrOIT913HcLm/from1to3.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHkLt3oClv8q4uA4UX5wdgZi6WVBHoHLTLs63G3shGv7vlDAAII1o5*CSuEEFj0yapE9rBfiNrozEZ2YYGestDl7/from1to3_chart.png) but, for example, if you start from November to February, labels on x axis disappear [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHmyYT*jLSXHQKltiOoUeUePIkAwlmbRrQSoDUB6A0tWbyrGLt53CEmFLR4*b-vkWrEwwuUgnQLCdACaQVDqNT9W/from11to2.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHnmkTymfXG6aFyinZcAvpQQg1YTS7UPzGqbOnX4NYkGSoQnCVu57ZlCoanxiHcqEhqIXABeba8k2QgQTMkUDsac/from11to2_chart.png) The issue is because of the "monthslist For Loop". I have modified a bit this part of code, and it should be fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHkL99HR6eE5sZU7xWTfsNmFfWc8Ay6OqEsuRXb1dq7EahjMnVukbJMZpVythSx51HxkcbJEZxrrtrJu65LP*8NF/change.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHlpsBYWN3so7KmD-WjK*v9KZ8iWX22bMRNknlHwHpugTTiIZpr5lVIB2kgHhoXLee3*JyhdpGHtCtjTlnXaB*HX/from11to2_chart_corrige.png) I think it works well. Let me know what do you think about this variation. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4h0-cPxZNHkXNpaw7yjy0wyXrWEgQFkdwfhP9JheB-3uIxZXSSFLv-Emtq-eKX1aJBPTPJnBMLKyL8*8-NEQ*KKnAFcFaCDz/change_2.png) Best Antonello
